name: KeyValueStore
documentation:
A simple interface for storing, retrieving, and removing key-value pairs.

This interface provides basic persistence operations such as storing values (with optional guarantees), retrieving them by key, conditionally storing only if absent, and deleting by key.

Note: This API is considered legacy in the Fluxzero Runtime. It is recommended to use the more advanced and flexible {@code DocumentStore} instead, which supports structured querying, indexing, updates, and document lifecycle features.

This interface is still supported internally for backward compatibility and simple data use cases. @see io.fluxzero.sdk.persisting.search.DocumentStore

methods.name: delete
methods.documentation:
Removes the value associated with the given key.

 @param key the key to delete
